mapper.select:
select
from cust_warranty WHERE warranty_uuid=#{_parameter} AND state=1

select
from cust_warranty
`warranty_uuid` in ( select `warranty_uuid` from cust_warranty_person where card_code=#{card_code} and card_type=#{card_type} and start_time<= #{end_time} and end_time>=#{start_time} and type=1 ) and `product_id`=#{product_id} and warranty_status!=6 and warranty_status!=7 and state=1 limit 1

select COUNT(`cust_warranty`.`id`) from cust_warranty LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` where `cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`=#{manager_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state`=1 AND (`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=2 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=3 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=4 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=5) AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=#{person_type} AND `cust_warranty_person`.`card_type`=#{card_type} AND `cust_warranty_person`.`card_code`=#{card_code}

select
from cust_warranty where find_in_set(#{pre_policy_no},`pre_policy_no`) and state=1
